entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
